content.raw:
When I update via the tutorial, using apt-get install srcsim, I am missing library files, for example, the .so file associated with the solar panel.  But if I compile from source those files are there.
Are others seeing the same thing or am I missing a step in the standard updating procedure?

Oh, turns out that with either method I am missing

libTouchPlugin.so

which is needed for task 2.
content.html:
When I update via the tutorial, using apt-get install srcsim, I am missing library files, for example, the .so file associated with the solar panel. But if I compile from source those files are there. Are others seeing the same thing or am I missing a step in the standard updating procedure?

Oh, turns out that with either method I am missing

libTouchPlugin.so

which is needed for task 2.
